name: MQTT IoT
tagline: A self-hosted MQTT environment for IoT sensor data from ESP8266 dev boards
body:
### A self-hosted MQTT environment for IoT sensor data from ESP8266 dev boards
This repository contains the code that I use for my IoT gadgets at home. I have a number of ESP8266 boards with sensors that publishes data via MQTT to a Raspberry Pi. The RPi stores the data in a MongoDB and forwards the data to a cloud service (Adafruit IO).

![Overview](https://larsbergqvist.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/localandadafruitio.png?w=656)

### Details
The setup is described in three blog posts:
* https://larsbergqvist.wordpress.com/2016/06/24/a-self-hosted-mqtt-environment-for-internet-of-things-part-1/
* https://larsbergqvist.wordpress.com/2016/06/24/a-self-hosted-mqtt-environment-for-internet-of-things-part-2/
* https://larsbergqvist.wordpress.com/2016/06/26/a-self-hosted-mqtt-environment-for-internet-of-things-part-3/
